name: Food & Fatality!
description:
The restaurant is doing swell, that is, until some customers complained about some odd-tasting food!

The Foreman has caught on to these complaints and is now putting forth multiple trials to try to weed out the Foilers!

The staff is gathered by the Foreman to be tested by making Food. The restaurant's Flavor is at stake!

It's the group's job to figure out who is turning all the Food Foul - but be careful! Any suspicious behavior, and the Foreman will have you Fired!

Will the restaurant lose all its Flavor and get shut down? Or will the staff root out the Foilers? Try it out for yourself in this extremely simple yet infinitely replayable card game!

Recommended Ages: 10+

Recommended player count: 7
